tool.help:
.. class:: infomark ========================== STOC eps for specialists groups ========================== **The STOCeps2 tool allows to generate 3 datasets :**
One presenting annual variation by species : * This file contains the outputs and its interpretations of the statistical model (glm abundance variations according to the square and the year) which makes it possible to see the inter-annual variations of abundance of the populations of birds for each specialists groups by habitat (specialists in agricultural, forestry, built, open and generalist). It is thanks to these values that the graphic representations are realized.
Another with global trends by species : * This file contains the outputs and its interpretations of the statistical model which makes it possible to have the global tendency of the variation of abundance over the whole period of time of the considered specialists groups. The model used is a linear regression of relative abundances according to time.
The information file relating to the calculation of the indicator by specialist group: * This file contains the details of the weights assigned to each species and each year in the calculation of the indicator by group of specialists. As the numbers of some species are too small to have a good estimate of their relative abundance, a weight is attributed to them.
